channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Video Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Video Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-5169|2024-08-01T21:03:11.041Z -- unknown -- video%20widget
item.description: The Video Widget WordPress plugin through 1.2.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-5169|2024-06-26T06:00:04.539Z -- unknown -- video%20widget
